categories: Category:Outer Rim Territories planets on the Hydian Way

nodes.text: Tosste was a uninhabited rocky planet located within the Outer Rim Territories.

Tosste was a small planet, located within the Atravis sector of the Outer Rim Territories, in the Western Reaches. Tosste was a dead world made of wide flat lands of rocks. It was made up of a giant ocean at one point but then the landscape turned to rock.
Tosste was once an inhabited world until all life forms disappeared.

It was on Tosste that a young Maul was introduced to The Force by his master Darth Sidious, who also demonstrated its offensive and destructive power, by flinging rocks at the young boy and telekinetically lifting two boulders and smashing them together.

The Tosste system was was under control of the Confederacy of Independent Systems at the end of the Clone Wars. The planet was the site of a battle of the Western Reaches Operation during the Imperial Reconquest of the Rim in 17 BBY. Imperial starfighters defeated Guun Cutlax and the Iska pirates.
